showDirInf[source]

showDirInf(path_dir:Path, suffix_list:list=['.jpg', '.jpeg', '.png'])

Show file paths, names, types and indicate wheather to remove. Args
path_dir : path to image directory suffix_list : list of acceptable image suffixes or extensions(remove if not listed) Return None
